avdta.vehicle

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.vehicle.Vehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Vehicle>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PersonalVehicle, Taxi

    public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Vehicle>
    Represents a (single) vehicle in the network.
    By default the vehicle has a length of 19 ft. Each vehicle has an id to uniquely identify it in the network. route is a Path which tells us the links that the vehicle will be using. net_enter_time is time the vehicle enters the network.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
